sentence:
…It was a totally divisive and partisan speech.  The President was calling Senators names, berating Joe Biden. It was a  campaign speech.

The gentleman from Washington (Mr. Baumgartner) says that the  President is supposed to be the President of the entire United States,  not just Republicans.
